title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 339: Featuring Mike McKenna
description:
On Episode 339 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets the guys are joined by Mike McKenna. Mike joined (1:01:56) to talk about the Vegas Golden Knights, how he got into TV, his pro career and tons more. The guys open up the podcast talking Islanders vs Tampa and give a full playoff update from everything they missed. The boys also touch on a hilarious moment from a Nathan MacKinnon press conference from this past week. The guys wrap up the show talking golf, movies and give a Game 1 recap of Vegas-Montreal.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
